mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Chilson, Henry D. Patient Age: 17. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture inferior maxilla. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Deserted 1865/01/17 on furlough.
